about.title: Hi, I'm Leroy
about.description: After graduating I directly started working at my last internship. This was a digital agency that gave me a lot of time and freedom to develop myself with new technologies and soft skills. I've been working for 5 years of different frontend projects (react/vue) and the occasional backend tasks. My javascript experience is extraordinary for the 5 years I've been working with it professionally.

impressive.title: The most amazing
impressive.description: ... thing I've developed is a extremely high performance application for radio news readers. This application handles massive amounts of news articles and interaction was always very steady.
